## DatabaseTable class

Datasource based on a table/view using OpenRestDB

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DatabaseTable extends SQLSource implements DataSource 
```
**Extends:** SQLSource

**Implements:** [DataSource](./forms42core.datasource.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addColumns(columns)](./forms42core.databasetable.addcolumns.md) |  | Add columns participating in all operations on the table/view |
|  [addDMLColumns(columns)](./forms42core.databasetable.adddmlcolumns.md) |  | Add additional columns participating in insert, update and delete |
|  [addFilter(filter)](./forms42core.databasetable.addfilter.md) |  | Add a default filter |
|  [clear()](./forms42core.databasetable.clear.md) |  | Closes backend cursor |

|  [closeCursor()](./forms42core.databasetable.closecursor.md) |  | Close the database cursor |
|  [delete(record)](./forms42core.databasetable.delete.md) |  | Mark a record for deleting a row in the table/view |
|  [fetch()](./forms42core.databasetable.fetch.md) |  | Fetch a set of records |
|  [flush()](./forms42core.databasetable.flush.md) |  | Flush changes to backend |
|  [getFilters()](./forms42core.databasetable.getfilters.md) |  | Return the default filters |
|  [getSubQuery(filter, mstcols, detcols)](./forms42core.databasetable.getsubquery.md) |  | Get the query as a subquery |
|  [insert(record)](./forms42core.databasetable.insert.md) |  | Create a record for inserting a row in the table/view |
|  [lock(record)](./forms42core.databasetable.lock.md) |  | Lock the given record in the database |
|  [query(filter)](./forms42core.databasetable.query.md) |  | Execute the query |
|  [refresh(record)](./forms42core.databasetable.refresh.md) |  | Re-fetch the given record from the backend |
|  [removeColumns(columns)](./forms42core.databasetable.removecolumns.md) |  | Remove columns participating in all operations on the table/view |
|  [setDataType(column, type)](./forms42core.databasetable.setdatatype.md) |  | Force a datatype |
|  [undo()](./forms42core.databasetable.undo.md) |  | Undo not flushed changes |
|  [update(record)](./forms42core.databasetable.update.md) |  | Mark a record for updating a row in the table/view |
